posts.post_title: 1904 Sweet Caporal and 1911 Hassan Cigarette Boxes For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jon Canfield
I've just added two cigarette boxes to the "For Sale" section of my website.

The first is a 1904 Sweet Caporal slide and shell (same configuration as used for T206 distribution) and the second is a 1911 Hassan outer shell.

Both can be viewed here:

[url]http://baseballandtobacco.com/sale.htm[/url]

For the premier souce of information on baseball-related cigarette packs on the web, visit [url]http://www.baseballandtobacco.com[/url]
